DOC.brief_summary: This trial is conducted in Japan. The aim of this trial is to investigate the efficacy of insulin detemir on blood glucose control in subjects with insulin requiring diabetes.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and the Safety of Insulin Detemir in Subjects With Insulin Requiring Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Duration of diabetes mellitus for at least 2 years Current treatment of basalbolus regimen for at least 12 weeks using an intermediate/longacting human insulin and insulin aspart HbA1C below 11.0% Impaired renal function Impaired hepatic function Serious heart diseases Known hypoglycaemia unawareness or recurrent major hypoglycaemia Proliferative retinopathy or maculopathy requiring acute treatment Uncontrolled treated/untreated hypertension Current treatment with total insulin dose of more than 100 IU/day Current treatment or expected at the screening to start treatment with systemic corticosteroids
